SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.game

Interface GameModelInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
Game
public interface GameModelInterface
This interface contains all the methods that can be called from the GameController

  • Method Details

    • isStarted

      boolean isStarted()
      get if the game is already started
      Returns:
      true, if the game is started

    • isRunning

      boolean isRunning()
      Returns:
      true if the game is started or resumed

    • subscribeToListener

      void subscribeToListener(BoardSubscriber subscriber)
      Add a new BoardSubscriber to the listener for livingRoom updates
      Parameters:
      subscriber - the BoardSubscriber to be added

    • subscribeToListener

      void subscribeToListener(BookshelfSubscriber subscriber)
      Add a new BookshelfSubscriber to the listener for all the players' bookshelf
      Parameters:
      subscriber - the BookshelfSubscriber to be added

    • subscribeToListener

      void subscribeToListener(ChatSubscriber subscriber)
      Add a new ChatSubscriber to the chatListener
      Parameters:
      subscriber - the ChatSubscriber to be added

    • subscribeToListener

      void subscribeToListener(PlayerSubscriber subscriber)
      Add a new PlayerSubscriber to each player's listener
      Parameters:
      subscriber - the PlayerSubscriber to be added

    • subscribeToListener

      void subscribeToListener(GameSubscriber subscriber)
      Add a new GameSubscriber to the gameListener
      Parameters:
      subscriber - the GameSubscriber to be added

    • subscribeToListener

      void subscribeToListener(GameStateSubscriber subscriber)
      Add a new GameStateSubscriber to the gameStateListener
      Parameters:
      subscriber - the GameStateSubscriber to be added

    • start

      void start() throws NotAllPlayersHaveJoinedException, GameNotEndedException
      This method is used to start the game, it chooses randomly a starting player
      Throws:
      NotAllPlayersHaveJoinedException - if the number of player that have joined is less than the number set when the game was created
      GameNotEndedException - if the game has already started

    • getPlayerInTurn

      String getPlayerInTurn() throws GameEndedException, GameNotStartedException
      gets the player that is in the turn
      Returns:
      a String representing the name of the player
      Throws:
      GameEndedException - if the game is ended
      GameNotStartedException - if the game has not started yet

    • moveTiles

      void moveTiles(ArrayList<Coordinates> source, int column) throws InvalidCoordinatesException, EmptySlotException, NotEnoughSpaceException, GameNotStartedException
      make it possible to move tiles from the livingRoomBoard to a column of the current player in turn
      Parameters:
      source - the source coordinates
      column - the column chosen by the player
      Throws:
      InvalidCoordinatesException - if the coordinates chosen don't follow the constraints
      EmptySlotException - if one of the coordinate is empty
      NotEnoughSpaceException - it the column has no enough space left
      GameNotStartedException - if the game has not started yet

    • checkValidRetrieve

      boolean checkValidRetrieve(ArrayList<Coordinates> coords) throws EmptySlotException, GameNotStartedException
      checks if the item tiles in a certain coordinate can be chosen by the player
      Parameters:
      coords - the coordinates in the livingroomboard containing the interested tiles
      Returns:
      true, if is possible to get that tiles, false otherwise
      Throws:
      EmptySlotException - if one of the coordinates referes to an empty slot
      GameNotStartedException - if the game hasn't started yet

    • refillLivingRoom

      void refillLivingRoom()
      refills the living room

    • checkBookshelfComplete

      boolean checkBookshelfComplete()
      checks if the bookshelf of the player in turn is completed
      Returns:
      true, if the bookshelf is full, false otherwise

    • getWinner

      String getWinner() throws GameNotEndedException, GameNotStartedException
      if the game is ended, it returns the username of the winner player
      Returns:
      the username of the winner
      Throws:
      GameNotEndedException - if the game is not yet ended
      GameNotStartedException - if the game has not started yet

    • checkRefill

      boolean checkRefill()
      checks if the livingroom need to be refilled
      Returns:
      true, if is necessary to refill the livingroom, false otherwise

    • updatePlayerPoints

      void updatePlayerPoints(String username) throws InvalidPlayerException, NotEnoughSpaceException, TokenAlreadyGivenException, GameNotStartedException
      This method is used to update the points of the player passed as argument
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the player whose points you wish to update
      Throws:
      InvalidPlayerException - if there isn't a player with that username inside the game
      NotEnoughSpaceException - if there was an error with the CommonGoalCard
      GameNotStartedException - if the game is not started yet
      TokenAlreadyGivenException - if the token was already assigned to another player

    • setPlayerTurn

      boolean setPlayerTurn()
      switches the turn to the next player
      Returns:
      true, if the switch can be done, false otherwise

    • canStart

      boolean canStart()
      check if the game can start
      Returns:
      true, if the game have the right conditions to start, false otherwise

    • getPlayerMessages

      ArrayList<Message> getPlayerMessages(String player) throws InvalidPlayerException
      This is the method to retrieve all the messages relative to a player, either sent and received
      Parameters:
      player - a String that represent the username of the player for which to search the messages
      Returns:
      an Arraylist of messages relative to the player
      Throws:
      InvalidPlayerException - if there isn't a player with that username inside the game

    • postMessage

      void postMessage(String sender, String receiver, String message) throws SenderEqualsRecipientException, InvalidPlayerException
      This method is used to send a private message to another user
      Parameters:
      sender - is the username of the sender
      receiver - is the username of the receiver
      message - is the message object that will be added to the list
      Throws:
      SenderEqualsRecipientException - if the recipient and the sender of the message is the same user
      InvalidPlayerException - if there isn't a player with that username inside the game

    • postMessage

      void postMessage(String sender, String message) throws InvalidPlayerException
      This method is used to send a global chat message
      Parameters:
      sender - is the username of the sender
      message - is the message object that will be added to the list
      Throws:
      InvalidPlayerException - if there isn't a player with that username inside the game

    • handleRejoinedPlayer

      void handleRejoinedPlayer(String username) throws PlayerNotFoundException
      Handle the changes in the game when a user rejoins the game after a crash
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the player that has crashed
      Throws:
      PlayerNotFoundException - if there isn't a player with that username inside the game

    • handleCrashedPlayer

      void handleCrashedPlayer(String username) throws PlayerNotFoundException
      Handle the changes in the game when a user crashes
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the player that has crashed
      Throws:
      PlayerNotFoundException - if there isn't a player with that username inside the game

    • isCrashedPlayer

      boolean isCrashedPlayer(String player)
      This method is used to retrieve if a player is currently crashed or is active
      Parameters:
      player - the username of the player
      Returns:
      if the player is crashed

    • triggerAllListeners

      void triggerAllListeners(String userToBeUpdated)
      Method used to trigger all the listeners when a player joins or re-joins a game after a crash, to receive the complete status of the game such as players bookshelf's, points or livingRoomBoard
      Parameters:
      userToBeUpdated - the username of the user that needs to receive the updates
